short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the Add Comment button on Canva projects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will automatically hide the annoying "Add comment" button on Canva pages.

Installation:
Download and install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
The extension will start working automatically, hiding the "Add comment" button on every project page you visit.
